column4: why is it the linux community say server and they mean 'web' server, why is that? not File server or Backup Server or Application server, like business wise, why is that? lol it drives me potty :P
not sure - because most of the time when people say 'server' they mean 'web server', probably. People who want advice on a file server will generally be more specific than just 'server'
ahh i see, that makes sense, LOL.
thanks for clearing that up, another n00b problem.  heheheheheh
